abstract: Texas lawmakers begin inquiry into confrontational behavior of white Texas state trooper Brian T Encinia in arrest of black woman Sandra Bland, who committed suicide after being taken into custody for traffic stop.
lead_paragraph: Trooper Brian T. Encinia behaved rudely and failed to de-escalate a confrontation with Ms. Bland, the head of the state police told lawmakers.

headline.main: Texas Trooper’s Behavior Called ‘Catalyst’ in Sandra Bland’s Death
headline.print_headline: Trooper’s Behavior Is Called a ‘Catalyst’ in Bland’s Death

snippet: Trooper Brian T. Encinia behaved rudely and failed to de-escalate a confrontation with Ms. Bland, the head of the state police told lawmakers.
